Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html#/s:9Ba.name: invalidLength
Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html#/s:9Ba.abstract: The String to decode has invalid length. A string that should be decoded should have a length that is a multiple of 8

Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html#/s:9Ba.name: illegalCharactersFound(_:)
Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html#/s:9Ba.abstract: Thrown when the encoded String contains illegal characters.

Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html#/s:9Ba.name: invalidPaddingCharacters
Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html#/s:9Ba.abstract: Thrown when the encoded String contains one or more invalid padding characters (=).

Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html#/s:9Ba.name: missingCharacter
Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html#/s:9Ba.abstract: Thrown when reading the encoded String and no character can be found at position one or two even though it should exist.

Structs/Base32.html#/s:9Base32Kit0A0V6en.name: encode(string:)
Structs/Base32.html#/s:9Base32Kit0A0V6en.abstract: Encodes the given string with the standard Base 32 alphabet as defined in section 6 of RFC 4648.

Structs/Base32.html#/s:9Base32Kit0A0V9en.name: encodeHex(string:)
Structs/Base32.html#/s:9Base32Kit0A0V9en.abstract: Encodes the given string with the “Extended Hex” Base 32 alphabet as defined in section 7 of RFC 4648.

Structs/Base32.html#/s:9Base32Kit0A0V6de.name: decode(string:)
Structs/Base32.html#/s:9Base32Kit0A0V6de.abstract: Decodes the given string with the standard Base 32 alphabet.

Structs/Base32.html#/s:9Base32Kit0A0V9de.name: decodeHex(string:)
Structs/Base32.html#/s:9Base32Kit0A0V9de.abstract: Decodes the given string with the “Extended Hex” Base 32 alphabet.

Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html.name: DecodingError
Structs/Base32/DecodingError.html.abstract: Errors that can be thrown during decoding of a Base 32 encoded string.

Structs/Base32.html.name: Base32
Structs/Base32.html.abstract: The Base32 struct contains methods to encode and decode data using the Base 32 encoding as defined by RFC 4648.
